results.description: Three-time world champion Mark Selby beats Xu Si of China 4-2 in the first round of the Northern Ireland Open at the Waterfront Hall.
results.shortTitle: Selby beats Xu Si in NI Open first round
results.title: Northern Ireland Open: Mark Selby beats Xu Si 4-2 in first round

results.description: World number four Neil Robertson wins a dramatic Champion of Champions final by beating Judd Trump 10-9.
results.shortTitle: Robertson beats Trump 10-9 in final
results.title: Champion of Champions: Neil Robertson beats Judd Trump 10-9 in dramatic final

results.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan's Crucible conqueror James Cahill can upset world champion Judd Trump at the Northern Ireland Open, says his coach.
results.shortTitle: Trump test can 'kick-start' underdog Cahill
results.title: Northern Ireland Open: Judd Trump test an 'opportunity' for underdog James Cahill

results.description: Judd Trump held off a fight-back from Northern Ireland's Mark Allen to reach the final of the Champion of Champions event in Coventry.
results.shortTitle: Trump beats Allen in Champions semis
results.title: Judd Trump beats Mark Allen in Champion of Champions semis

results.description: World number one Judd Trump overcomes Mark Allen 6-4 to set up a final against Neil Robertson in the Champion of Champions event.
results.shortTitle: Trump survives Allen scare to make final
results.title: Champion of Champions: Judd Trump survives Mark Allen fightback to make final

results.description: Neil Robertson moves into the final of the Champion of Champions event by beating Ronnie O'Sullivan 6-5 in a thrilling semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Robertson moves into Champions final
results.title: Champion of Champions: Neil Robertson beats Ronnie O'Sullivan in semi-final

results.description: Veteran Jimmy White is beaten 4-3 by Ronnie O'Sullivan as their Champion of Champions match in Coventry goes to a deciding frame.
results.shortTitle: O'Sullivan beats White in decider
results.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan beats Jimmy White 4-3 in the Champion of Champions

results.description: Reanne Evans says she is "gutted but proud" after being a frame away from becoming the first woman to beat a man in snooker's top 16.
results.shortTitle: Evans 'proud' after narrow Murphy defeat
results.title: Reanne Evans 'proud' after narrow Champion of Champions loss to Shaun Murphy

results.description: Reanne Evans loses 4-3 to world number eight Shaun Murphy on her Champion of Champions debut, with Murphy then beaten 6-5 by Neil Robertson.
results.shortTitle: Evans loses decider to Murphy on debut
results.title: Reanne Evans loses 4-3 to Shaun Murphy on Champion of Champions debut

results.description: Judd Trump wins his sixth title in the last year with a 10-5 win over Thailand's Thepchaiya Un-Nooh in Yushan.
results.shortTitle: Trump beats Un-Nooh in World Open final
results.title: Judd Trump beats Thepchaiya Un-Nooh in World Open final

thumbnail.altText: Judd Trump at the World Open in China

results.description: Snooker great Jimmy White is confirmed to face five-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan at the Champion of Champions event next week.
results.shortTitle: White to face O'Sullivan in Coventry
results.title: Jimmy White to play Ronnie O'Sullivan at Champion of Champions event

results.description: Antrim teenager Robbie McGuigan, the stepson of former Masters champion Mark Allen, is awarded a place in this month's Northern Ireland Open in Belfast.
results.shortTitle: Antrim teen McGuigan to play in NI Open
results.title: Robbie McGuigan: Antrim teenager awarded place in Northern Ireland Open

results.description: Northern Mark Allen is out of the World Open in China losing 5-3 in the third round to England's David Gilbert.
results.shortTitle: Allen misses out on last eight in China
results.title: World Open: Mark Allen misses out on last eight in China

thumbnail.altText: World number seven Mark Allen reached the semi-finals in three of his last five tournaments
World number seven Mark Allen reached the semi-finals in three of his last five tournaments
World number seven Mark Allen reached the semi-finals in three of his last five tournaments
World number seven Mark Allen reached the semi-finals in three of his last five tournaments

results.description: Defending champion Judd Trump will face a quality field at next month's Northern Ireland Open at the Waterfront Hall in Belfast.
results.shortTitle: Defending champion Trump in NI Open field
results.title: Northern Ireland Open: Defending champion Trump heads quality field

results.description: Welshman Dominic Dale seals his first ever win over Ronnie O'Sullivan, while Judd Trump and Mark Selby also progress at the World Open in China.
results.shortTitle: O'Sullivan loses to Dale for first time
results.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan suffers first defeat against Dominic Dale

results.description: World number five Mark Selby produces a dominant display to thrash David Gilbert 9-1 in the English Open final in Crawley.
results.shortTitle: Selby beats Gilbert to win English Open
results.title: English Open: Mark Selby hammers David Gilbert 9-1 in final

results.description: Mark Allen beats Lee Walker 5-1 in the English Open quarter-final to set up a final four showdown with Mark Selby in Crawley.
results.shortTitle: Allen marches into English Open semis
results.title: English Open: Mark Allen marches into semi-final with 5-1 victory over Lee Walker

results.description: Five-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan knocked out of the English Open after a 4-3 fourth round defeat to China's Mei Xiwen in Crawley.
results.shortTitle: O'Sullivan out of English Open
results.title: English Open: Ronnie O'Sullivan beaten by Mei Xiwen in Crawley

results.description: Mark Allen moves comfortably through to the last eight of the English Open with a 4-0 victory over Barry Hawkins in Crawley.
results.shortTitle: Allen into quarters with whitewash win
results.title: English Open: Mark Allen goes through to last eight with another whitewash victory

results.description: Five-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan edges past 19-year-old Chinese player Yuan Sijun in round two of the English Open in Crawley.
results.shortTitle: O'Sullivan edges past teenager Yuan
results.title: English Open: Ronnie O'Sullivan beats China's Yuan Sijun in Crawley
